column1: #Text=Young Azula says : " Dad 's going to kill you !
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Fine , do n't believe me .
#Text=Grandfather said Dad 's punishment should fit his crime .
#Text=" You must know the pain of losing a first - born son .
#Text=Young Azula says : " I 'm only telling you for your own good .
#Text=Dad would never do that to me !
#Text=" Ursa says : " Your father would never do what to you ?
#Text=" Young Azula says : " I do n't know ... " Ursa says : " It 's time for a talk !
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Azula always lies .
